name: Franky, Joe & Dirk: On the Tiles
overview: Ever had that mixed up, crazy feeling?...Well pick up your Game Boy and prepare yourself for the most mind-blowingly addictive puzzle game ever, featuring Franky, Joe and Dirk all ON THE TILES. Mixed up pictures, mad professors, ticking time bombs, bonus slabs and booby traps are just some of the crazy features lurking along the way, as you try to complete over 30 different jumbled pictures. With 4 levels of difficulty and only a limited amount of time in which to complete each screen, you'll definitely need your wits about you. From total beginners to total experts, your life may never be quite as sane again! -Full password re-entry system. -Bonus icons, traps and special features galore and the clock keeps ticking away!
